name: AN IMPORTANT MEMORY FOR HUMANITY BY REFIK ANADOL

metadata.name: AN IMPORTANT MEMORY FOR HUMANITY
metadata.description:
This eponymous piece of the collection is a poetic visualization of the audio and visual memories and health data collected from the Inspiration4 mission. As its title suggests, this seminal data sculpture solidifies a memorable moment in the history of space exploration in the blockchain space. 

The work processes the entire data archive of the mission including photographic and audio memories of the mission, such as vehicle data and audio/visual recordings from the flight. To create this milestone moment in 21st century art, Anadol pushes machine-learning research into new territories where scientific innovation meets artistic expression.

NFT Data Sculpture Installation, 
15:00 Loop with sound  
3840 x 2160 PX  
Dimensions (W x H x D):  50'' x 66'' x 8''

This artwork comes with an artist-signed 3D physical certificate with backup source installation files, a custom computer with software, transparent OLED by LG Display, to be shipped by the artist to the future buyer. The artistâ€™s studio will assist the future buyer with installation instructions and oversight.
